update product
product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_code = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quick_search_code = #{quickSearchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prove = #{prove,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eng_name = #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_source = #{goodsSource,jdbcType=BIT},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_dict_code = #{categoryDictCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bar_code = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gift_flag = #{giftFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
jf_exchange_flag = #{jfExchangeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
jf_price = #{jfPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_price = #{memberPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
best_price = #{bestPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
limit_down_price = #{limitDownPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yk_price = #{ykPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jk_price = #{jkPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zk_price = #{zkPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_threshold = #{stockThreshold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_pattern = #{salePattern,jdbcType=BIT},
marketing_rule = #{marketingRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_start_time = #{saleStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sale_end_time = #{saleEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
patent_code = #{patentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_number = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_type = #{approvalType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
import_flag = #{importFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
production_time = #{productionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiration_date = #{expirationDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
valid_date = #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_use_num = #{totalUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_use_num = #{oneUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_to_times = #{oneToTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cj_name = #{cjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cj_country_no = #{cjCountryNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cj_province_no = #{cjProvinceNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cj_city_no = #{cjCityNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cj_area_no = #{cjAreaNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},

forbidden = #{forbidden,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
raw_stock = #{rawStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = null,
disease_id = #{diseaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disease_id = null,
disease_pid = #{diseasePid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disease_pid = null,
finance_code = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finance_code = null,
image_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT max(product_code) as maxCode FROM product ;
SELECT count(`status`) AS cnt ,`status` AS status FROM product WHERE del_flag = 0 GROUP BY status;
select product_code as productCode, status as status, update_time as updateTime from product where product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update product set sale_start_time = #{saleStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sale_end_time = #{saleEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_no = #{updateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_code in
#{item}
mapper.select: select p.product_code as productCode, p.product_no as productNo, p.quick_search_code as quickSearchCode, p.`name` as name, p.nickname as nickname, p.eng_name as engName, p.goods_source as goodsSource, p.brand_no as brandNo, p.category_dict_code as categoryDictCode, p.sale_price as salePrice, p.cost_price as costPrice, p.limit_down_price as limitDownPrice, p.stock as stock, p.stock_threshold as stockThreshold, p.marketing_rule as marketingRule, p.sale_start_time as saleStartTime, p.sale_end_time as saleEndTime, p.patent_code as patentCode, p.approval_number as approvalNumber, p.approval_type as approvalType, p.import_flag as importFlag, p.production_time as productionTime, p.expiration_date as expirationDate, p.valid_date as validDate, p.unit, p.total_use_num as totalUseNum, p.one_use_num as oneUseNum, p.one_to_times as oneToTimes, p.cj_name as cjName, p.cj_country_no as cjCountryNo, p.cj_province_no as cjProvinceNo, p.cj_city_no as cjCityNo, p.cj_area_no as cjAreaNo, p.cj_addr as cjAddr, p.descri, p.applicable as applicable, p.forbidden as forbidden, p.raw_stock as rawStock, p.video_url as videoUrl, p.disease_id as diseaseId, p.disease_pid as diseasePid, p.image_url as imageUrl from product p where product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
